rules_text:
[i]Engage![/i] – {2}{B}{R} [i](You may put this card under another legendary creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Trample
[i]Raging Storm[/i] – Whenever Edelgard engages or you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, Edelgard deals 3 damage to each opponent and each creature with flying.
